trends: There have been 62 other sightings in Memphis
There were no other sightings in Memphis on or around September 7th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsMy dad was reading a magazine and I was playing in the back yard.I looked up and saw a giant gleaming H shaped aircraft.The way it flew was so silent an yet fast.It didn't have any lights,signs,or windows.And it didn't look like any kind of ship the military used.As I watched it disappear into the sunset dad called the military base and asked if any special aircraft was flying around.They said they didn't know anything about it. -Kalee H.
